trans-unit.source: List Storage Accounts
trans-unit.target: List Storage Accounts

trans-unit.source: List Storage Accounts (Media Services)
trans-unit.target: List Storage Accounts (Media Services)

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>GET</languageKeyword> request method described in this topic returns a list of <languageKeyword>StorageAccountDetails</languageKeyword> for the Storage Account associated with the specified Media Services account.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>GET</languageKeyword> request method described in this topic returns a list of <languageKeyword>StorageAccountDetails</languageKeyword> for the Storage Account associated with the specified Media Services account.

trans-unit.source: The data contract for <languageKeyword>StorageAccountDetails</languageKeyword> is defined later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: The data contract for <languageKeyword>StorageAccountDetails</languageKeyword> is defined later in this topic.

trans-unit.source: The request may be specified as follows (replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;accountName%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your account name.):
trans-unit.target: The request may be specified as follows (replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your subscription ID, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;accountName%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with your account name.):

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: GET
trans-unit.target: GET

trans-unit.source: https://endpoint/<subscriptionId>/services/mediaservices/Accounts/<accountName>/StorageAccounts
trans-unit.target: https://endpoint/<subscriptionId>/services/mediaservices/Accounts/<accountName>/StorageAccounts

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about error codes, see <link xlink:href="fb7d4575-9ceb-46f9-84da-34ce4df84894" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Media Services Management Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about error codes, see <link xlink:href="fb7d4575-9ceb-46f9-84da-34ce4df84894" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Media Services Management Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: When attaching multiple storage accounts to your Media Services account, the following considerations apply:
trans-unit.target: When attaching multiple storage accounts to your Media Services account, the following considerations apply:

trans-unit.source: All storage accounts attached to a Media Services account must be in the same data center as the Media Services account.
trans-unit.target: All storage accounts attached to a Media Services account must be in the same data center as the Media Services account.

trans-unit.source: Currently, once a storage account is attached to the specified Media Services account, it cannot be detached.
trans-unit.target: Currently, once a storage account is attached to the specified Media Services account, it cannot be detached.

trans-unit.source: Primary storage account is the one indicated during Media Services account creation time.
trans-unit.target: Primary storage account is the one indicated during Media Services account creation time.

trans-unit.source: Currently, you cannot change the default storage account.
trans-unit.target: Currently, you cannot change the default storage account.

trans-unit.target: Data Contract

trans-unit.target: For more information about request and response formats, see <link xlink:href="f7b363f7-4c14-4b4b-ac68-6b8bf23ee3ba" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Operations on Media Services</link>
